concept.title: What is subtraction?
concept.shortdesc: Here you will learn what is subtraction

conbody.p: To successfully perform the task of subtracting numbers, you must know what subtraction is. The term "subtraction" represents a mathematical operation. Subtraction allows you to find the difference between numbers.
You use the minus (-) button to express the subtraction operation in CohnCalc.
In the subtraction process, you take a number and reduce it to a smaller number.
